params.eventName: is the name of the event to create
params.maxNumberOfTickets: is the maximum number of tickets that can be created for this event
params.price: is the price of a single ticket for this event

params.ticketCollection: the collection from which to get the price

returns.price: of a ticket for the event associated with `ticketCollection`

purchase(address,string).details: Takes the initial NFT token holder's name as a string input and transfers ERC20 tokens from the purchaser to the creator of the NFT collection

params.ticketCollection: the collection from which to buy the ticket

purchase(address,string).notice: Allows a user to purchase a ticket from `ticketCollectionNFT`

documentation.text: map ticket collection addresses to their mint price.
